name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performing the song 'Adult Suits'.
MC section where Towa speaks to the audience about her 6th anniversary.

subtitles.original: Can't get away when I try to explain
subtitles.english: Can't get away when I try to explain

subtitles.original: Nothing comes out along with my expectation
subtitles.english: Nothing comes out along with my expectation

subtitles.original: I must play and act your feeling
subtitles.english: I must play and act your feeling

subtitles.original: Breathing, I gotta change this relation
subtitles.english: Breathing, I gotta change this relation

subtitles.original: アダルトな着ぐるみ着てる僕
subtitles.english: I'm wearing an adult-sized costume suit.

subtitles.original: 心はいつも不安定 天秤シーソー
subtitles.english: My heart is always an unstable seesaw balance.

subtitles.original: まさかの発言で孤立化する
subtitles.english: Isolated by an unexpected remark.

subtitles.original: 色眼鏡越し彷徨う僕
subtitles.english: I wander through the view of colored glasses.

subtitles.original: 今日も今この瞬間に腹が立つ
subtitles.english: Even today, right now, this moment makes me angry.

subtitles.original: 言葉がいつも後ろ髪引く
subtitles.english: Words are always holding me back.

subtitles.original: 全部ダメダメなんでしょ？
subtitles.english: Everything is no good, right?

subtitles.original: じゃあもう放っといて
subtitles.english: Then just leave me alone.

subtitles.original: ハナからなかったことにしよう
subtitles.english: Let's pretend it never happened from the start.

subtitles.original: ラリルラリラリラ
subtitles.english: La-li-lu-la-li-la-li-la.

subtitles.original: それじゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: That won't do, no good.

subtitles.original: 悪い癖だね もうしない
subtitles.english: It's a bad habit, I won't do it anymore.

subtitles.original: どうせ嫌われているなら 食い気味でいこう
subtitles.english: If I'm going to be hated anyway, let's be aggressive.

subtitles.original: 何もかもが暗く黒く見える
subtitles.english: Everything looks dark and black.

subtitles.original: 色眼鏡付きのアダルトなパチモンスーツ
subtitles.english: An adult-sized knockoff suit with colored glasses.

subtitles.original: 必殺技かけるゼロで全部
subtitles.english: My special move multiplied by zero equals everything.

subtitles.original: 消し去ってやろうか 強気な僕
subtitles.english: Shall I wipe it all away? My strong-willed self asks.

subtitles.original: だけど実際はやっぱ溺死したいの
subtitles.english: But in reality, I actually want to drown.

subtitles.original: 身軽さ奪われ動けない
subtitles.english: Robbed of my agility, I can't move.

subtitles.original: それでもいい子とバランスとれてるんだよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I'm keeping a balance with being a 'good kid'.

subtitles.original: 君は耳元でそれを言う
subtitles.english: You whisper that right into my ear.

subtitles.original: それにしちゃ少しあんまりじゃない？
subtitles.english: Considering that, isn't it a bit too much?

subtitles.original: ていうか不公平じゃない？
subtitles.english: Or rather, isn't that unfair?

subtitles.original: どうせ勝ち目なんてないし
subtitles.english: There's no chance of winning anyway.

subtitles.original: 食い気味でいこう
subtitles.english: Let's be aggressive.

subtitles.original: I feel this moment
subtitles.english: I feel this moment

subtitles.original: No one can take it
subtitles.english: No one can take it

subtitles.original: そんなん会だって 伝わらなけりゃ意味ないないないの
subtitles.english: Even a meeting like that means nothing if it doesn't get across.

subtitles.original: 今日も今この瞬間が大事なの
subtitles.english: Today too, this very moment is what's important.

subtitles.original: 奪う権利はあなた方にはない
subtitles.english: You people don't have the right to steal it.

subtitles.original: 全部ダメダメ
subtitles.english: Everything is no good.

subtitles.original: 何がダメダメなんでしょ？
subtitles.english: What exactly is no good?

subtitles.original: なあ 納得いくまで話してよ
subtitles.english: Hey, explain it until I'm satisfied.

subtitles.original: どうせ屁理屈並べるんならバカみたい
subtitles.english: It looks stupid if you're just going to list quibbles anyway.

subtitles.original: トドメを刺す気でいるなら
subtitles.english: If you intend to deliver the finishing blow,

subtitles.original: 今がチャンスだぞ
subtitles.english: now is your chance!

subtitles.original: はーい！Yeah！ということで...
subtitles.english: Haaai! Yeeeah! So...

subtitles.original: こやっぴー！常闇トワ様です。
subtitles.english: Koyappi! I am Tokoyami Towa-sama.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、なんと...
subtitles.english: Yes! So, surprisingly...

subtitles.original: 本日6周年を迎えました！
subtitles.english: Today marks my 6th anniversary!
Yaaay! Six... Six?

subtitles.original: 悪魔の数字「6」？
subtitles.english: The devil's number 'six'?

subtitles.original: ということは今年はトワちゃんの年ということでもいいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Does that mean it's okay to say this is Towa-chan's year?

subtitles.original: ま、よくないか。いいか。
subtitles.english: Well, maybe not. Or is it okay?

subtitles.original: ま、人によってはトワちゃんの...
subtitles.english: Well, for some people...

subtitles.original: ね、あの年しにしたっていいということで。
subtitles.english: you know, it's fine to make it Towa-chan's year.

subtitles.original: はい、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Yes, please treat me well!
